title: Characterization of dolomite and calcite microcalcifications in human breast tissue
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28741-28752
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04137B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sahar Gal, Mariela J. Pavan, Netta Vidavsky
Microcalcifications within minimally processed tissue sections from breast cancer patients were analyzed. Most of these microcalcifications were calcite and dolomite crystals, with dolomite being observed in tumorous tissue for the first time.
